Header.title: Dugar Polychem
Header.paragraph: We are Dealers, Distributors & Importers of PVC Resin, Plasticisizers & Additives.

About.paragraph: Dugar Polychem is an innovator and a market leader in the PVC, DOP, Plasticisizers and addiives business, being involved in the industry for a span of nearly two decades. With customers around the country, and cutting edge latest products with the most ethical business practices, we are set to revolutionise the industry.
About.paragraph2: We are led by our founder, Bhavesh Kumar Dugar, who has led to reach future goals for the company.
Why: Exclusive consultation to our clients for latest products and technologies
Why2: Excellent indepth knowledge about market fluctuations

Services.name: Trading of Plasticisers and Derivatives
Services.text: We deal in PVC Resin, DOP, Plasticisers and Additives. We also have a wide range of products and cater to your industrial needs

Services.name: Import of Raw Materials
Services.text: We specialise in dealing with international companies for specialised additivies and other products, with our stratergic partners around the globe.

Services.name: Technical Consultancy
Services.text: We have a team of highly qualified and experienced professionals who are dedicated to providing the best technical solutions to our clients.
